comments.body:
Since you are not building on Windows you can remove the `build.sh` file and add:

`script: python setup.py install --blosc=$PREFIX --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt`

here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  script: python setup.py install --blosc=$PREFIX --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
